meanings.definition: A protein complex consisting of actin and myosin found in muscle cells.
meanings.sent1: The actomyosins in muscle cells help with movement.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study actomyosins to understand how muscles work.
meanings.sent3: The actomyosins in the muscle cells decided to have a dance party.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as actomyosins pulling a heavy load.
meanings.sent5: The actomyosins contract and relax, just like a dance routine.

meanings.definition: The contractile proteins responsible for muscle contraction.
meanings.sent1: Actomyosins play a key role in muscle contraction.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need strong actomyosins for powerful movements.
meanings.sent3: The actomyosins threw a party to celebrate a successful workout.
meanings.sent4: His strength was like actomyosins, always ready to spring into action.
meanings.sent5: The actomyosins work together like a well-oiled machine during exercise.
